entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trim analyzer should warn on unnecessary DynamicallyAccessedMembers #109802
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Object synchronization method was called from an unsynchronized block of code #109800
    10.0.0
  • OnAfterRenderAsync Not firing in MainLayout #109798
  • chrome-DebuggerTests failing on mono while waiting for pause #109795
  • Wasm size is increasing in .Net 9 #109787
  • HttpClient converts HEAD requests to GET request #109791
  • Step becomes a "go" in .NET 9 #109785
    10.0.0
  • "Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute" mangles Constants #109784
  • dotnet-install.sh still returns 7.0 as latest STS version #109781
  • [API Proposal]: `Debug.Fail()` and `Trace.Fail()` #109780
  • App hangs after taking crashdump in official .NET 9 x64 glibc docker images #109779
  • Platform-agnostic way of passing environment variables to `corehost` / `nativeaot` #109778
    Future
  • SSE/AVX byte multiplication could be improved #109775
  • LOH increases its size until OOM #109774
    10.0.0
  • nethost SIGSEGV on Linux when used with jemalloc #109773
  • Deserializing JSON with properties that differ in casing #109768
    9.0.x
  • `StringValues`' implementation of `object.Equals(object?)` breaks symmetricity invariant #109767
  • AF: ILC: Assertion failed '((simdSize == 16) && compOpportunisticallyDependsOn(InstructionSet_SSE41)) || ((simdSize == 32) && compOpportunisticallyDependsOn(InstructionSet_AVX2))' #109760
  • Configuration Binder source generator creates namespace ambiguity and not found error #109759
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Correct Trimming RootMode for ConfigurationManager #109777
  • FileStream Not Suppressing Finalization on Dispose Call #108465
    10.0.0
  • Failed to invoke two associated SO files using DllImport，System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load shared library #109762
  • [API Proposal]: Apply [OverloadResolutionPriority] to Span-based overloads #109549
    10.0.0
  • BigInteger correctness regression from .NET 8 #109669
    9.0.x
  • JIT: libraries jitstress AV failures #109730
    10.0.0
  • Libraries jitstress: Assertion failed 'target->hasProfileWeight()' #109657
    10.0.0
  • JsonPolymorphic with JsonDerivedType cannot be serialized / deserialized with System.Text.Json #109755
  • Metadata blob is too large, exceeding 16MB #109720
  • .NET to COM/ActiveX - params/ParamArray not supported for VB98/VB6 and earlier #109751
  • Add a good Binary Serializer #102535
    Future
  • Valid Base64 can be treated as Invalid by Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 in net9.0 #109761
  • New HttpClient API design #22505
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Array de abstraction cloning #109803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace DAMT.All with more restricted annotation on InvokeMember/FindMembers/DeclaredMembers #109801
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.StartRequestAsync assertion failed #109799
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove switch recognition fallthrough quirk #109796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Continue profile consistency checks until after finally cloning #109792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109789
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Fix regression in constructor parameter binding logic. #109786
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109783
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109782
    area-System.Security
  • [cdac] Implement `ExecutionManager.ReadyToRunJitManager.GetMethodInfo` (minus handling of hot/cold lookup) #109766
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • fix profiling env var names in profiling.md #109764
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #109763
    area-Host, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix name of MonoAOTOffsets artifact in runtime.yml #109797
    needs-area-label
  • Replace DAMT.All with DAMT.AllMethods in delegate creation #109772
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework
  • Don't build installers in source-build #109794
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Don't try to create fallthrough from try region into cloned finally #109788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Allow building Mono Cross AOT compilers in the VMR #109776
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix AOT warning in System.Linq.Expressions #109758
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Apply OverloadResolutionPriority to Span-based delegating to ROS counterparts #109602
    area-System.Memory
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Fix BigInteger bitwise operators on certain negative numbers #109684
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Optimize for cost instead of score in 3-opt layout #109741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly set UnsupportedTargetFrameworkVersion for VS support #109769
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109706
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: fix inliner profile consistency computation #109714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SseItem's ctor eventType argument to be nullable #109765
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [ppc64le] Fixed System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests failures #109725
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Support building the repo with clang 20 #109756
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch #109753
    area-PAL-coreclr

Updated

  • Gc poll without HELPER_METHOD_FRAME #109378
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove pre-LSRA `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #108402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors. #109749
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109648
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add a missing = in BigInteger.cs #109732
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Run downlevel tests only on main #109723
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109731
    area-System.Security
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove .NET Framework-era remoteable wait subsystem #109754
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Propagate delegate loads during inlining #109715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Ilc failure in PHASE_EARLY_PROP #2683
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Ilc assert with locals in release config #2682
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement RhGetCommonStubAddress ? #2735
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Debug info generation does not define types properly #2728
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge tests when targeting Wasm #2695
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] `--compress-relocations` broken #2752
  • [RuntimeAsync] Support runtime-async instance methods on structs #2766
  • [RuntimeAsync] Validate and fix support for arm64, x86 and arm32 #2764
  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix GC holes for suspended runtime-async methods + collectible assemblies #2759
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtimelab/feature/async2-experiment` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #2723

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Document generic methods #2771
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix linux-x64 support #2770
    area-async
  • [RuntimeAsync] Add support for arm64 #2769
    area-async
  • [RuntimeAsync] Clean up and fix async2 tests #2768
    area-async

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge oct 08 #2762
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [RuntimeAsync] Add x86 support #2767

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default The New C# File Template to File-Scoped Namespace #44852
  • ApiCompat suppression file is not compatible between Windows and Linux #44851
  • .NET 9 terminal logger litters output with "Build succeeded" on commands that do not build anything #44848
  • One-shot execution mode for build servers #44846
  • Error: dotnet restore Fails with NullReferenceException in .NET SDK 9.0.100 During Docker Build #44841
  • Should DisplayVSMessage condition read from NETCoreAppMaximumVersion instead of UnsupportedTargetFrameworkVersion #44839
  • dotnet list package --vulnerable throws ArgumentException: '' is not a valid version string [.NET 9] #44838
  • Building PublishProfile=DefaultContainer doesn't show output indicating a container image gets built. [.NET 9] #44837
  • Install .NET 9 from Ubuntu official jammy\noble source? #44835
  • Linux installers should install manpages to correct location #44833

Closed

  • Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.net6.Manifest-9.0.100 with version (= 9.0.0) missing from NuGet feed #44836
  • minimumExpectedTests for dotnet test #37101
  • dotnet test html logger throws execption when using special characters in DataRow attributes. #38983
  • Can't opt out of VSTestUseMSBuildOutput in project file #39127
  • Machine-readable `dotnet test --list-tests` output #39957
  • Error: The type or namespace name 'HttpClient' could not be found in projects using net472 when net8 is installed. #43932
  • dotnet test cache/result output cache #41589
  • MapStaticAssets on component lib that uses CompressionIncludePatterns cannot compile #44784

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't cloak the ANCM setup folder #44857
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update AddSourceToNuGetConfig task #44854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-install: Avoid duplicate sources #44853
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix images used for helix tests in CI #44850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET 9 GA, MAUI baseline manifests #44845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump darc to fix VMR synchronization issues #44844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions and to GA #44834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #44821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #44823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #44824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines" (#43011) #44832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection #44807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #44827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [dotnet-watch] Separate build from run #44699
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Remove 6 from the branch codeflow #44829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error CS0121: File.AppendAllTextAsync("", null) #75905
  • Area - MSBuildWorkspace - 2 #75900
  • Area - MSBuildWorkspace #75899
  • IDE0021 showing up as warning despite being silent in editorconfig #75896
    17.13
  • Fix occurrence of IDE0028 for a c# Dictionary causes compile error CS9215 #75894
  • visual studio provider errors with use of field keyword - when typing #75893
  • Roslyn allows additional *primary_constraints* when the `notnull` primary constraint is used #75892
  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
  • Roslyn crashes when opening a project without Visual Studio version 2017 or higher installed on a machine #75886
  • Incremental builds are broken #75884
    17.13 P2
  • Integration test failures in Roslyn dartlab CI #75883
    17.13 P2
  • PR validation submit automation #75882
    17.14 P1
  • "New Line" options are _still_ not taking effect in VS 2022 Community (Version 17.13 Preview) - Please reopen this issue. #75881

Closed

  • Options master plan #58717
    Backlog
  • File-Scoped Namespace should always have a fix all option available #58673
    Backlog
  • Make Extract Method command handler async and move Extract Method service OOP #58550
    Backlog
  • Inline diagnostic tags are oddly rendered if there's linked files involved #58443
    Backlog
  • Add more accessible options for unused code visual indicator #58400
    Backlog
  • Developers can easily navigate & explore code #58271
    Backlog
  • FindAllReferences on Length property or Slice method misses usages in list-patterns #58190
    Backlog
  • IDE Refactoring: Add interpolated string handler members #58174
    Backlog
  • Unify INotifyPropertyChanged implementation in Roslyn XAML+ layers #58148
    Backlog
  • Go To All to include external types #58146
    Backlog
  • cw snippet adds global::System.Console when i use it on lambda expressions. #58135
    17.13
  • Provide interactive help to reflow expressions #58093
    Backlog
  • Ensure Default editorconfig in Visual Studio is the same as the one that ships in the .NET SDK #58085
    Backlog
  • Should the comment TODO behavior be changed? #57899
    Backlog
  • Rename tracking conflicts with Generate Method and cannot be disabled #57876
    Backlog
  • When auto implementing an interface or abstract class, I would like the ability to choose on the fly between auto generated and throwing properties #57844
    Backlog
  • IDE0007 and IDE0008 configuration only offers prefer one or the other. We need a "developer's choice". #57734
    Backlog
  • `using` directives inside namespace blocks should be recognized as redundant with ImplicitUsings: enable #57729
    Backlog
  • BatchFixAllProvider crashes with "An element with the same key but a different value already exists" #57660
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2022 EnforceCodeStyleInBuild causes error to show twice #57647
    Backlog
  • Unable to View Class Definitions from Nuget in Visual Studio Community #75902
  • Explore moving source parsing to async open file operation #57553
    Backlog
  • Inline diagnostics should be delayed until after a user is done typing #57533
    Backlog
  • IDE should cache source-generated docs so that they are available for subsequent sessions without recomputation. #57532
    Backlog
  • Notify InfraSwat and ICs ASAP when validation insertions are failing RPS #64872
    Backlog
  • C# code cleanup: Add a mechanism to remove inactive code (#if-defed out) #57451
    Backlog
  • Revisit assembly layering fix for .NET SDK #57387
    Backlog
  • for loop snippet ignores var preference #70092
    17.13 P2
  • C# semantic snippet inserts wrong line endings #67739
    Backlog
  • Semantic Snippets #56541
    17.13
  • Open generated file didn't go live again once the file was present again #56997
    Backlog
  • 'Remove unnecessary cast' cases we could support in the future. #56938
    Backlog
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    Backlog
  • Roslyn should move our VSPackage code to be servicehub based #56568
    Backlog
  • "using" command in "Quick Actions and Refactoring" missing (CSharpAddImportCodeFixProvider is disabled) #56497
    Backlog
  • Can't read lightbulb entries when they are too long #56485
    Backlog
  • Merge issue with 'Use pattern combinator' and fix-all #56523
    Backlog
  • Wrong Comment token inserted, should xml variant. #56336
    Backlog
  • IDE0301/IDE0303/IDE0305 triggers on code that cannot be converted #75885
  • Detect SourceGenerator slowness and notify users to disable #55580
    Backlog
  • More style options for IDE0090 - Target-typed new expressions #55305
    Backlog
  • Extract method from multiple carets #55165
    Backlog
  • Remaining work to get pull diagnostics + LSP fully enabled, and all push-diagnostics + error list code removed. #62772
    17.6 P3
  • Revisit usage of global SimplifierOptions in IBuiltInAnalyzer.OpenFileOnly #60795
    17.6 P3
  • Bumping diagnostic severity for some IDE analyzers to error/warning doesn't cause it to run for closed files. #16700
    Backlog
  • Convert to Generated RegEx mangles Constants #75866
  • License tests fail using VS Community Preview #45653
    Backlog
  • Change Namespace to Match Folder Structure Breaks Razor Using Clause #57885
    18.0
  • Extension method lookup results in unexpected behavior with OverloadResolutionPriority #75871
    17.13 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle field reference from semantic model in non-field-backed property #75904
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issue where we were recommending removing the GetEnumerator method used in a foreach #75903
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • improve goto-def on an invalid override #75901
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix case where we were erroneously offering to convert a dictionary to use a collection expression. #75897
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify shape of APIs used for Overload Resolution Priority feature #75891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Add workflows to manage and notify about issues #75890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .NET 9 runtime for single machine CI job #75889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Gladstone #75888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add more cases supported by 'use collection expression' #75879
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • [EnC] Implement support for restarting subset of projects affected by rude edits #75874
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Workaround failing official builds #75898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix an allocation regression due to the recent SegmentedList change c… #75895
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Always sync text changes and active doc info to remote workspace #75864
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Collection literals: remove DictionaryElementSyntax (#68752)" #75880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Don't let inapplicable members participate in ORPA filtering #75878
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, VSCode
  • Enable TypeDefinitionProvider LSP capability #75819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, 17.13 P2
  • Add embedded classification support for locals passed into an annotated api at a later point #75875
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, 17.13 P2
  • Disallow escaping refs to implicit rvalue temporaries #75830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13 P2
  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, 17.13 P2
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13 P2
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13 P2
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use `IsManagedType` for determining which state machine hoisted locals to clear #75841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server .net 9 Websocket connection fails, Same site with .net 8 works fine #58932
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #58928
  • Perf improvement: json #58927
  • (NET 9) MapControllers() don't work with option PublishTrimmed = true #58926
  • Assembly name ending with "App" (e.g., "MyCompany.Web.App") crashes on macOS with error 137 #58918
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58916
  • OpenAPI Ref invalid when objects cycles #58915
  • KestrelServer Diagnostic Source #58911
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58909
  • Default Authentication Scheme Not Honored with JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme in .NET 8.0 #58906

Closed

  • Fully implement nullable support in Identity templates. #25310
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Q: Is WebAuthn planned to be implemented by aspnet.identity? #5780
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Como Hackear Instagram com Eficácia 2024 #58912
  • [WebToolsE2E] Publish to Folder failed with error "Unable to copy file..." after adding scaffolding for 9.0 Blazor Web project. #57583
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .NET 8 Blazor form processing with action to Razor Components Page with static SSR #56445
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Google Pagespeed Insight is flagging blazor.server.js #56323
    .NET 10 Planning
  • BlazorBFFOidc and DevTunnel - Auth to MS Entra works for swagger SPA and nearly working for Blazor website #55537
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Enhance Navigation works horribly, I would suggest drop it all and re do it again. #54982
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, json #58894
  • Trying to Render HTML for a HTMX integration.. #52382
    Backlog
  • VS 2022. ASP.NET Core with Angular. Opening multiple ng serve consoles when ClientApp fails #48805
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Razor pages handlers does not support IConvertToActionResult #46855
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Update AuthenticationService.js to refresh Blazor WASM user interface when user is logged out via check_session_iframe #48058
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Microsoft Edge translation causes crash because of DOM manipulation #47111
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Publishing a server hosted wasm app fails in dotnet 7 rc1 #44182
    .NET 10 Planning
  • When Blazor WASM PWA app is hosted in subdirectory and published to Azure service-worker makes requests to wrong path. #31801
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Is there any way we can use adMob for Blazor Hybrid ? #58919
  • Blazor NotFound route causes reload #58886
  • Consider flagging ListenOptions.Listen(IPAddress.Any) #58172
  • Como Hackear WhatsApp com Segurança #58913
  • Error: dotnet restore Fails with NullReferenceException in .NET SDK 9.0.100 During Docker Build #58907

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58931

  • Add 9.0 SiteExtension, remove some 6.0 bits #58925
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-enable benchmark validation for HttpSys, gRPC #58923
    area-grpc
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • Fix XmlDocs for StaticAssetsEndpointRouteBuilderExtensions MapStaticAssets #58905
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Address variable initialization warnings in ANCM (C26494) #58904

Merged

  • Remove some references to release/6.0 #58929

    area-infrastructure, 6.0.36
  • Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58846

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #58898
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.12
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0.1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `9511905` to `9aeb12b` #58744
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.36
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `1204d63` #58745

  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #58900

  • Mark API from 9 as shipped #58897

    area-infrastructure, analyzer, 10.0-preview1

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to build and run an Android .NET 7 application with the latest MAUI .NET 9 / Visual Studio 17.12 installed #25845
  • AccurracyBestForNavigation is misspelled #25844
  • Images are not showing on Android - MAUI 9.0.0 #25843
  • Pickers Inside CollectionView get SelectedItem Cleared on Scrolling #25842
  • The program has exited with code 3221226356 (0xc0000374). #25837
  • Span with tail truncation and paragraph breaks with Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException #25836
    Backlog
  • Issue with .NET MAUI Microsoft.Maui.Controls 9.0 Update. Error (CS0246) #25835
  • [9.0, Android] Buttons have acquired a default padding, perhaps around RC1 or so #25834
  • App fails to inject INavigationRootManager when using PushModalAsync #25833
  • DEP0900: Failed to unregister application [0x80073CFA] #25832
  • Slow UI rendering performance #25831
  • [9.0 GA, Android] ScrollView starts at the position of first Entry control at start rather than at 0 #25829
  • ApplicationVersion <> 1.0 in solution with UnitTestProject causes compile errors #25828
  • Double Trigger of CollectionView SelectionChanged Event on MacCatalyst Platform #25826
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ListView with ViewModel+ObservableCollection won't update ViewCell #25824
  • BindableProperty validation does not throw an ArgumentException, although it is documented as such #25823
  • Version 8.0.100 produces compilation errors in standard application #25820
  • XAML Data Binding Error - Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #25819
  • ScrollView with Editor has incorrect screen movement judgment #25817
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync Crashes Android Emulator Debug Session #25816
  • Flyout Menu Icon Changes to 'Back' Icon When Flyout Appears #25809
  • NET MAUI app template not available on Visual Studio #25808

Closed

  • Entry is autofocused in a Popup but the soft keyboard is not opened, also cannot be opened from code! #25793
  • Android losing fonts #25540
  • _ #25830
  • Unable to run a first MAUI app #25641
  • Enable Publish a MacCatalyst app from Windows #25805
  • `CollectionView` throws `NRE` when `ItemTemplate` uses a `ViewCell` as parent #24379
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.0 to 1.6.2 #25841
    community ✨
  • Add Syncfusion announcement blog post to news in README #25840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Differentiate app icon & splash screen colors for sample content template #25839
    area-templates
  • Move main to GA builds #25838
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right end #25825
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 9 #25815
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed the iOS BackButton title does not update when set to an empty string or whitespace #25813
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Merged

  • Fixed README for .NET 9 #25821
    area-docs, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 8 #25814
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Download using new APIs #25800
    area-infrastructure
  • Update bug-report.yml to include .NET 8 SR10 #25810
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Update Windows SDK projection for testing #25781
    community ✨
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fixed the hide password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #25768
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix issue with FilePicker for iOS apps running on Mac #25668
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    area-testing, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area-controls-window
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
    area-essentials, area-controls-map
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2

  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidOperationException when LangVersion is set to preview #35100
  • Unapply a specific list of migrations #35098
  • EF Core not saving all rows and misses some data for rows that are saved. #35097
  • EF Core 9 Migration Transaction change? #35096
  • Exception on query comparing nullable int with ?? fallback on EF Core 9 #35095
  • Sequence contains no elements on MinAsync, MaxAsync, etc. #35094
  • The data types varchar and nvarchar are incompatible in the '^' operator #35093
  • Cosmos SQL query enum array (Contains) to string conversion not working properly #35092
    Backlog
  • Generates Incorrect UPDATE Instead of INSERT SQL for New Entity in One-to-Many Relationship #35090
  • Represent query parameters with a dedicated type instead of ParameterExpression #35089
    10.0.0
  • New index with a different name removes old one with the same columns #35087
  • Rename Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Cosmos.Query.Internal.Expressions #35086

Closed

  • EF generates sql statement for non existing column in a table #35044
  • Issue in IReverseEngineerScaffolder.ScaffoldModel() #35099
  • ef core migration add Error with using Strongy Type record as Identity #35068
  • Script-Migration for SQL Server does not script transactions correctly #34841
    9.0.0
  • invalid FK field name #35034
  • Database.SqlQuery ignores value conversion #35088
  • EF9 is 2x slower than EF 8 and allocates 3.5x more memory on a simple query with 2 Includes #35091

PullRequests

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35054
